document_data.name: Soleilon Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Soleilon Dynasty''' was the first established dynasty to rule over the city-state of [[Westgate]]. It was established in {{Yearlink|-137}} when the righteous [[paladin]] [[Gen Soleilon]] slew the [[vampire]] King [[Orlak]] and claimed the throne. The Soleilon Dynasty would reign until {{Yearlink|-27}}.
document_data.Monarchs:
; King [[Gen Soleilon|Gen "the Radiant King"]] 
: Reigned -137 DR – [[-91 DR]]. First King of the Soleilon Dynasty.
; King [[Lemere Soleilon I|Lemere I the "Merchant King"]] 
: Reigned -91 DR – [[-74 DR]]. Firstborn son and heir of Gen.
; King [[Lemere Soleilon II|Lemere II]] 
: Reigned -74 DR – [[-68 DR]]. Firstborn son and heir of Lemere I.
; Regent [[Lharida Ithal|Lharida]] 
: Reigned -68 DR – [[-55 DR]]. Wife of Lemere II and regent until her son came of age.
; King [[Ryndarth Soleilon I|Ryndarth I the "Boy King"]] 
: Reigned -68 DR – [[-27 DR]]. Firstborn son and heir of Lemere II.
; Crown Prince [[Ryndarth Soleilon II|Ryndarth II "the Younger"]] 
: Reigned  – . Firstborn son and heir of Ryndarth I. Slain by a [[doppelganger]] before his father's death.
; King [[Ryndarth Soleilon II|Ryndarth II the "Masque King"]] 
: Reigned -27 DR. A doppleganger who assumed the form of the secretly deceased Ryndarth.
